reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress fits well, with one noting it's ideal for slim figures, and they appreciate its style, with one mentioning the unicorn pattern matches the picture exactly. The dress is well-made, comfortable, and versatile for various occasions, with one customer noting it's perfect for a 1950s-themed choir show. The fabric quality and sizing receive mixed feedback - while some praise the cotton material, others find it poor quality, and several mention the dress runs small. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute Little Black Dress BUT I Don‚Äôt Like The Material.
items.body: This is a cute little black dress! Great for date night and very versatile. Nice design and good quality but I didn‚Äôt care for the material. It was a lint trap and very easy to wrinkle. I don‚Äôt have time to iron! I need functional wash and wear clothing that travel well with my busy lifestyle. I returned this dress for a different material but same color and design. Not a bad price for the quality. Fit was true to size and color was as pictured. Read more
items.author: Kathleen Washington

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Modest and cute!
items.body: My daughter needed a Christmas dress that fit certain parameters. She is long and lean. 5'4" and 89 pounds. We ordered a 2. This hit just past the knees. A 0 would have been better, but this did the job. She's only 13 and didn't fill out the bust but she looked cute and felt good in the dress. It washed and dried nicely in the machine and didn't wrinkle. She appreciates the pockets. After trying quite a few stores it was nice to find something that worked! Read more
items.author: Katie Hall

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars True to size- decent quality
items.body: Cute dress, purchased for Halloween- skirt is NOT as poofy as shown- would need petticoats to obtain the look- fit was fine- sized up but probably unnecessary. Materials is good thickness and seams were done well. Belt is not attached- bow is not tied- must be ironed. Read more
items.author: SHERRI T

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress
items.body: Love the colors and fit. Good quality and loved the pockets. Read more
items.author: Doreen C

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Holiday Beauty
items.body: Love love love this style. A bit modern with a bit retro. Soo many compliments on this beautiful plaid number. Read more
items.author: Mom2Be

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress but problems with arms and not for taller girls.
items.body: I really wanted to like this dress. The fabric is very comfortable, and I love the unicorn pattern. The pockets were also usable (my full-size phone fit), even though they were a bit higher than I'd like. The fit is more or less true to size, but there's a problem: I can't lift my arms. The sleeves are tight and stiff. Lifting my arms even just to drive was very uncomfortable. I am tall, but not extremely: 5'10" (178 cm), and this was the 3XL (according to their size chart I was a 2XL or 3XL). Very disappointing. Read more
items.author: A guy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress
items.body: Loved it. If fit my girls perfectly Read more
items.author: victoria kyakuwa

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dress
items.body: Good quality dress. Exact color need for Saint Patrick's Day. Very nice zipper and perfect material and size for me. The material has a little give to it. Very comfortable. Read more
items.author: Bridget Baert

short_description:
Womens Dress Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Dress Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Black Avocado, A-blush Pink, Pink Floral, Black Floral, Blush Pink Plaid, White Lemon, Black White, Orange Flower, Porcelain, Red Dot, Yellow Floral, Red Flower, Red Plaid, Colorful Floral. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
